articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Report: After many leaks, Switch 2 announcement could come “this week” - Ars Technica
articles.description: Reveal will reportedly focus on hardware, with game announcements to come later.

articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
articles.title: Biden administration proposes sweeping new restrictions on exporting AI chips - TechCrunch
articles.description: The Biden Administration's new guidelines are meant to further curb AI chip exports to countries like China and Russia.
articles.content:
With a week left in office, President Joe Biden introduced a new set of guidelines and restrictions for exporting U.S.-made AI chips.
On Monday the administration announced its Interim Final Rule on… [+2075 chars]

articles.author: Ariel Zilber
articles.title: Meta official blasts CEO Mark Zuckerberg for 'buckling to political pressure' - New York Post
articles.description: Decision to end the platform’s fact-checking program is raising questions about brand safety on the $1.5 trillion tech giant’s platforms.
articles.content: A top Meta official blasted CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s decision to discontinue fact-checking on Facebook, Instagram and Threads — saying the social media mogul was “buckling to political pressure” ahead o… [+5793 chars]
